title: South Park: The Fractured But Whole E3 2016 Trailer - Kinda Funny Reacts
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Greg and Tim breakdown theSouth Park: The Fractured But Whole E3 2016 Trailer!

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy

transcript_chunks.text: E3 2016 is happening Kinda Funny is going all out with Let's Plays and reaction videos all week long subscribe now at youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames to not miss a thing what's up guys I'm Tim Gettys this is the goddamn beautiful Greg Miller hi this is all your E3 2016 Kinda Funny coverage right now we're taking a look at South Park: The Fractured But Whole get it like butthole yeah interesting name like I feel like that's you know out of all the puns they could have made I feel like they really stretched out there for this one you think so yeah why I don't know it's just like I would have never thought fractured butthole you know but it's it makes sense cuz now they've explained it to Civil War Story yeah so they they're bringing it all in yeah superhero themed yes thank God last time Stick of Truth we had that fantasy **** Orcs And all elves and **** yeah great game Kenny looking like Zelda yeah yeah but now bam right up our alley Greg superheroes that's why we're doing

South Park: The Stick of Truth we had that fantasy RPG Orcs And all elves and **** yeah great game Kenny looking like Zelda yeah yeah but now bam right up our alley Greg superheroes that's why we're doing this one together bam cuz you know Colin likes the South Park game he doesn't like superheroes like we like superheroes and that's why there's so many great jokes in this one already making fun of Marvel they're making fun of DC already I said this earlier Greg this trailer my favorite trailer thus far of E3 we still have the Sony press conference to blow my mind with some Crash Bandicoot but this right here love it I love them looking at the plan trying to figure out how they're going to do their whole motion picture Universe un and they're talking all the **** and it's like man they're so funny South Park funny **** yeah I mean outside of just it being funny it was a great demo at E3 as well right showing how they have revamped the system it looks better it runs better here

So funny South Park: The Fractured But Whole E3 2016 Trailer - Kinda Funny Reacts, yeah I mean outside of just it being funny it was a great demo at E3 as well right showing how they have revamped the system it looks better it runs better here of course is that you know you know before it was just very simple combat because they were saying simple fantasy stuff for this it is you can go behind cover you get a little bit of a grid thing con described a little bit like Final Fantasy Tactics clearly light but that's interesting uh the ability that if you hit your guy back into another guy one of your people they can do additional damage and kick it out that way you're going to be moving people around rather than just have waves of people crashing into each other yeah I mean going back to the graphics this game it's so impressive yeah like it look as always looks like the the show you know which is such a testament to like where Graphics are at these days but also the art style of South Park being such a a thing that people know but

it looks like the show, you know, which is such a testament to like where graphics are at these days but also the art style of South Park being such a thing that people know but it just translates so well to a video game um of course you got to love the politically correct over here because they you know they're very topical, very very topical biggest surprise yeah December 6th this year I know get it's incredibly exciting and also if you pre-order you get Stick of Truth on the current gen consoles yeah finally get it there uh that's what you want of course you want your cuz we've been asking for it forever today right before the Ubisoft press conference the trophies leaked for the PlayStation 4 version which was like yes it's happening we can't wait so yeah super exciting as that's there uh actually probably when we get back from E3 I'll probably pre-order it so I can just jump right back in Stick of Truth I love Stick of Truth yeah did you
